meanings.definition: (ラテン語)薄片にする、薄板にする
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to make into thin plates or layers

etymology.value: ラテン語の「lamina」（薄板、薄片）に由来する。

verb_forms.present_indicative: lamino, laminas, laminat, laminamus, laminatis, laminant
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: laminabam, laminabas, laminabat, laminabamus, laminabatis, laminabant
verb_forms.future_indicative: laminabo, laminabis, laminabit, laminabimus, laminabitis, laminabunt
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: laminavi, laminavisti, laminavit, laminavimus, laminavistis, laminaverunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: laminaveram, laminaveras, laminaverat, laminaveramus, laminaveratis, laminaverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: laminavero, laminaveris, laminaverit, laminaverimus, laminaveritis, laminaverint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: laminem, lamines, laminet, laminemus, laminetis, laminent
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: laminarem, laminares, laminaret, laminaremus, laminaretis, laminarent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: laminaverim, laminaveris, laminaverit, laminaverimus, laminaveritis, laminaverint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: laminaavissem, laminaavisses, laminaavisset, laminaavissemus, laminaavissetis, laminaavissent

usage_notes.explanation: ラテン語の動詞であり、現代英語の「laminate」の語源。

derivatives: lamina (ラテン語: 薄板、薄片)
laminatio (ラテン語: 薄板化、薄片化)
laminatus (ラテン語: 薄板で覆われた、薄片状の)
